Name: Drone
Description:
Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and vespene gas. Can mutate into structures.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: A list of basic structures.
Root.Name: Basic Mutation

Root.Tooltip: A list of advanced structures.
Root.Name: Advanced Mutation

Root.Tooltip: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.
Root.Name: Burrow

Root.Tooltip: Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.
Root.Name: Burrow

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

ZBl1.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to spawn all Zerg units and receive gathered resources. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures. Can mutate into a Lair.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Hatchery

ZBl1.Tooltip: Mutated over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Extractor

ZBl1.Tooltip:
Enables:
- Queens at the Hatchery, Lair, or Hive
- Zerglings from Larvae
- Spine Crawlers from Drones
- Spore Crawlers from Drones
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Spawning Pool

ZBl1.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Zerg ground units.

Enables:
- Aberrations from Larvae with Lair or Hive
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Evolution Chamber

ZBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
ZBl1.Name: Cancel

ZBl1.Tooltip: Anti-ground defensive structure. **Can attack ground units**
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Spine Crawler

ZBl1.Tooltip:
Anti-air defensive structure. **Can attack air units**
Detector
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Spore Crawler

ZBl1.Tooltip: Mutated over a Vespene Geyser to allow automatic harvesting of vespene gas.
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Automated Extractor

ZBl1.Tooltip: Abathur's basic production structure is the Roach Warren, not the Spawning Pool.
ZBl1.Name: Spawning Pool Disabled

ZBl1.Tooltip: Bombards target location with bile, damaging ground and air units in the area.
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Bile Launcher

ZBl1.Tooltip: This unit unlocks at Commander Level 5.
ZBl1.Name: Mutate into Bile Launcher

ZBl2.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Zerg air units. Can mutate into a Greater Spire.

Enables:
- Mutalisks from Larvae
ZBl2.Name: Mutate into Spire

ZBl2.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
ZBl2.Name: Cancel

ZBl2.Tooltip:
Friendly ground units can use the Nydus Network to instantly travel to any other Nydus Network or Nydus Worm owned by the player.

Enables:
- Greater Nydus Worm
ZBl2.Name: Mutate into Greater Nydus Network

ZBl2.Tooltip:
Enables:
- Infestors from Larvae
- Swarm Hosts from Larvae
ZBl2.Name: Mutate into Infestation Pit

ZBl2.Tooltip:
Can mutate into an Impaler Den.Enables:
- Hydralisks from Larvae
ZBl2.Name: Mutate into Hydralisk Den

ZBl2.Tooltip: Morph into a Lurker Den, allowing Hydralisks to morph into Lurkers.
ZBl2.Name: Mutate into Lurker Den

ZBl2.Tooltip: This ability is locked by your Commander Prestige.
ZBl2.Name: Mutate into Nydus Network

ZBl2.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Scourge and Zerg air units.

Enables:
- Scourge from Larvae
- Corruptors from Larvae
ZBl2.Name: Mutate into Scourge Nest
